name: Hungry Kaiju
description:
You are a terryfing Kaiju and you need to eat some fish. And where are more fish than in Japan. But be careful, few people would love your head as a trophy so they use bomb traps -avoid them.

Control the Kaiju with UP and DOWN arrows

Thanks for playing my game. It was created for Ludum Dare 33 by NoahbroCZ: www.twitter.com/vondranoah

Music by Edtijo: www.freesound.org/people/edtijo
